sentences.sContent: In fact, she was an archaeologist.
sentences.sCn: 其实她是一个考古学家。

sentences.sContent: But I do not believe, as a field archaeologist, that we can use the scientific method to prove or disprove [them].
sentences.sCn: 但作为一个在现场工作的考古学家，我不相信我们能用科学手段对它们进行证实或证伪。

sentences.sContent: Somaliland's first archaeologist, Mire is now on a mission to preserve and protect what she says is a heritage at risk of disappearing.
sentences.sCn: 作为索马里兰的第一个考古学家，沼泽湿地现在的任务是维持和保护她所说的具有消失危险的遗产。

words.tran: [古] 考古学的；[古] 考古学上的

remMethod.val: archae(古) + olog(y)(学科) + ist(表人) → 考古学家
